item.title: Python and R
item.description: Python and R are able to communicate with each other even though they’re different languages! You can use the reticulate package in order to have R and python chunks communicate. Let’s look at a simple example! This is a picture of my dog when she was a puppy. Let’s say I wanted to use both R and Python to say just how cute she was as a puppy.
